backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, question submission, and admin-only answering with access control and validation.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of key frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling Internet Identity auth, profile gating, hash routing, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users for a display name and saving their profile with validation and pending states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared layout with NavBar, footer, and background music control wiring for play, pause, volume, and error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/NavBar.ts: A navigation bar component with route links, branding, and optional background music controls using popovers and volume/play interactions.
frontend/src/components/moderation/AddAn: A moderator form that submits an answer to a question with validation, character counting, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Manages background audio playback with autoplay attempts, volume control, error handling, and persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, questions, roles, and answers through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus global styles for borders and body typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the platformâ€™s purpose and values using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AskPage.tsx: Provides a form for submitting new questions with validation, optional anonymity, and guidance text display.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a hero section, an important notice, and a sorted list of recent questions with loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Shows a branded login screen with feature highlights and triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionDetailPage.ts: Fetches and displays a single question with metadata, answer details, and admin moderation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for the Ask Big Sister project.
